sources.title: The Tempermental Lion (1940)
sources.description: A lion with a Bert Lahr voice can't stand being cooped up in a cage at the zoo, and escapes to confront the man who captured him in the first place, big game hunter, Major Doolittle. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-tempermental-lion-1940/

metadata.Plot: A lion with a Bert Lahr voice can't stand being cooped up in a cage at the zoo, and escapes to confront the man who captured him in the first place, big game hunter, Major Doolittle.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
